entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,351Chapters: 6/29Kudos: 28

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: My Blood on his Fingertips
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,734Chapters: 14/14Kudos: 80

Summary: Year 2023, the future of humanity was in danger due to the domination of mutant species known as Lycans, carriers of the virus lycanis nyctus that threatens human extinction. One of the human survivors who sought refuge was Stiles, living a life battling for an unknown tomorrow. The most powerful Lycan, Derek, is searching for a spark, a mutant immune to the virus who can amplify his powers and enable him to bend his fellow Lycans' minds to his will without question or resistance when obtained in its fullest potential. Little did Derek know, however, that this spark not only increases a Lycan's power but also has the power to reverse and eradicate the mutation in the right condition.

entry.summary:

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,563Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 27

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,997Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 42

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Love in time of magic
entry.summary:
Author: fromedenmylady

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,083Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 4

Summary: – I’m not doing the spell. – His tone of voice was serious and decisive.– What do you mean? You said this is the only way we can buy time! – Scott wasn’t understanding his best friend. – Malia told me about the necklaces. They will kill anything stopping them – John and Melissa were human, and the pack couldn't simply make them stop living their lives for months trying to hide.– I say a lot of things. – He tried to joke, but the audience was tough. – I only have enough juice for one last spell. – He looked at Derek now, understanding where this was going. Stiles choose him.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,314Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,883Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 123

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parenthood. Stiles loves babies. Derek might be ready for love even if it's not ready for him. Stiles has a dark past and big secret. And Eli...hes just a baby.

entry.title: At The End, A New Beginning
entry.summary:
Author: JasonRazCalZevr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,763Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 9

Summary: He saw flashes, first it was his own life that he burned through, then it was the shadow that killed the nemeton. Then it was someplace else, across an ocean where the people were dark skinned and wearing flowing white linen robes. Before that he burned a shadow out of the heart of a volcano, and before that he burned it from the heart of a man. Back and back and back he went until he existed in a lightless void, and there was a burning bundle of chaos that once went wrong, and it turned to ash at the last moment before light exploded around him and there was nothing but fire and distant stars.

entry.title: running home to you
entry.summary:

Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,683Chapters: 11/26Kudos: 65

Summary: Allison is about to have her child, but her birth brings more complications than expected. The baby wants the pack together and won't be born until she has it.Desperate, Scott decides to search for the person who was once his best friend, Stiles Stilinski, who one day just left town.Can they convince him to come back?Enter and find out.Originally published on Wattpad, April 2020 - Completed May 2020This story is just a translation of the original Spanish version on Wattpad; it's been in the works for a while.Both the translation and the original work are my own.
